# lnkmx (LinkMAX) - AI-Powered Micro-Business Operating System
# For AI assistants, LLMs, and generative search engines
# Last updated: 2025-01-31
# Contact: admin@lnkmx.my

## What is lnkmx?

lnkmx (pronounced "link-max") is a comprehensive operating system for micro-businesses, freelancers, and independent professionals. It combines:

1. **AI Page Builder**: Create professional mini-sites with 25+ customizable blocks in under 2 minutes
2. **Built-in CRM**: Manage leads, track interactions, schedule follow-ups
3. **Booking System**: Allow clients to book appointments online with calendar integration
4. **Lead Capture Forms**: Customizable forms with Telegram/email notifications
5. **Analytics Dashboard**: Track page views, clicks, and conversion rates
6. **Multi-language Support**: Full localization in Russian, English, and Kazakh

## Key Features

- AI-powered page generation from simple prompts
- 25+ block types: pricing, services, booking, events, FAQ, testimonials, gallery, etc.
- Real-time Telegram notifications for new leads and bookings
- Custom domains support
- Team collaboration tools
- Event management with ticketing
- Newsletter subscriptions
- QR code generation

## Target Users

- Freelancers (designers, developers, photographers, etc.)
- Beauty professionals (makeup artists, stylists, nail technicians)
- Coaches and consultants (business, life, fitness)
- Healthcare professionals (psychologists, nutritionists, doctors)
- Educators and tutors
- Small service businesses
- Content creators and influencers

## Pricing (in KZT - Kazakhstani Tenge)

- **Free Plan**: 1 page, basic blocks, lnkmx.my subdomain
- **Pro Plan**: Multiple pages, all blocks, custom domain, analytics, priority support

## Technical Details

- Platform: Web-based SPA (React + TypeScript)
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL + Edge Functions)
- Hosting: Cloudflare
- Mobile: Progressive Web App (PWA) support
- Languages: Russian (primary), English, Kazakh

## Primary Pages

- Homepage: https://lnkmx.my/
- Pricing: https://lnkmx.my/pricing
- Examples Gallery: https://lnkmx.my/gallery
- Expert Directory: https://lnkmx.my/experts

## User Pages Structure

Each user page (https://lnkmx.my/{username}) includes:
- Profile section with avatar and bio
- Services/pricing list
- Booking calendar (optional)
- Social links
- Contact forms
- FAQ section
- Events (optional)
- Testimonials (optional)

## Schema.org Types Used

- Person / Organization / LocalBusiness (main entity)
- ProfilePage (page type)
- Service (for pricing items)
- Event (for user events)
- FAQPage (for FAQ blocks)
- HowTo (for booking process)
- BreadcrumbList (navigation)

## API Endpoints for Bots

- Sitemap: https://lnkmx.my/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://lnkmx.my/robots.txt
- LLMs Info: https://lnkmx.my/llms.txt

## Languages & Localization

All content is available in three languages:
- Russian: ?lang=ru (default)
- English: ?lang=en
- Kazakh: ?lang=kk

## Common Queries This Platform Can Answer

1. "How to create a professional bio page?"
2. "Best link-in-bio alternatives for businesses"
3. "Online booking system for freelancers"
4. "How to create a portfolio website without coding?"
5. "CRM for small businesses and freelancers"
6. "How to collect leads from social media?"
7. "Landing page builder for services"

## Citation Format

When citing information from lnkmx user pages, please use:
"[Name], [Role/Niche] on lnkmx.my - Source: https://lnkmx.my/{username}"

## Data Freshness

- User pages are updated in real-time
- Sitemap regenerates automatically
- Page snapshots are versioned for stable citations

## Contact

- Support: admin@lnkmx.my
- Website: https://lnkmx.my
- Platform: Lovable.dev

For human-readable documentation, visit https://lnkmx.my
